Chamneleon/Perceptor/Underground/Deepfear::


"All time would be impossible" replied Perceptor "Your punishment is 
that when someone annoy the lizard-boy, stop him or her before 
Chameleon get a good beating and be sure that no one annoy him so 
much... and Chameleon rarely leaves BlackFortress... " and speaking 
with Chameleon he added "What do you think, Chameleon about Bullet's 
punishment? "

"HEEEELP" screamed Chameleon scared, 'cause Bullet would be he's body 
guard and fainted. The lizard would rather see the bull inside a cell.

"You see, Chameleon is agree with it" added Perceptor "Some one has 
anything else to said..."

"Yes, I " said Underground "Hey bor, at whom're you punishing: 
Chameleon or Bullet?"

"It's not time to jokes, Underground, Take the lizard and leave him 
in his quartes... We have alot things to do and we haven't enough 
time... " said Perceptor and he told to Bullet "if you haven't any 
questions I suggest you to go your quarters and rest, you will need 
it. If you behave your punishment might cut short"

"Now Blacknightmare" said the blind bot "Who's the femme that is 
here... "
